name: Riflestorm
description:
An uprising has started from an insurgent organization spread around the globe. You must control a squad of elite soldiers to restore order against this invading threat. Explore randomly generated campaigns to fight off enemies, encounter random events, upgrade your squad and ultimately complete your mission. Can you fend off the attackers?

Key Features:

  • Tactical combat: Unforgiving turn-based gameplay, keep your squad alive as you complete your mission or else lose progress.
  • Build the ultimate squad: Choose from a wide variety of classes, mix and match abilities, and use gear found while exploring the world.
  • Nonlinear progression: Permanently unlock new classes and other secrets with each play through.
  • Randomly generated missions: Each adventure contains new random events, items and battles. No play through is the same.
